traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4 damage) acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in a 15-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8 damage) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
